explanation: [0-0] A child in blue clothes is sitting, while a man in red clothes stands behind and to the side of the child. The man is holding several US dollar bills in his left hand and looking forward. There is a red curtain on the left side.

[0-10] The man in red walks forward with the bills, approaches the child, and hands a bill to the child with his right hand. The child turns, takes the money with his right hand, opens his mouth in delight, and places the money between his legs. Then, the man in red talks and continuously hands bills to the child. The child repeats the action of taking the bills with his right hand and placing them between his legs, smiling happily all the while.
